stories.headline: Zelenskyy says U.S. gave Ukraine and Russia a June deadline to reach agreement to end war
stories.description: Zelenskyy says Ukraine and Russia have a June deadline for a peace agreement.

stories.headline: Reporter’s Notebook: Portugal’s far right surges in presidential election
stories.description: In the tourist haven of the Algarve, disaffected locals are embracing the far right as the cost of living rises.

stories.headline: Thousands mourn 32 victims of Islamabad Shia mosque bombing in Pakistan
stories.description: Pakistan blames ‘Indian-backed proxies’ for the attack; New Delhi rejected the accusation as ‘baseless and pointless’.

stories.headline: Epstein emails raise questions over role of Andrew's palace aide
stories.description: Emails suggest a trusted royal insider invited Epstein to a dinner at Windsor Castle in 2017.

stories.headline: Norway's crown princess apologises after pressure over Epstein friendship
stories.description: Mette-Marit says she is sorry to Norwegians for not realising what kind of person the late sex offender was.
